description:
Watch movies, TV shows, live programming, and sports including Amazon MGM Studios-produced series and movies Road House, The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power, Fallout, Reacher, The Boys, and The Idea of You, and much more. Browse titles, search for your favorites, or enjoy movies and shows recommended just for you.

App features:
• Download videos to watch anywhere.
• Rent or buy new-release movies and popular TV shows (availability varies by marketplace).
• Cast from your phone or tablet to the big screen with Chromecast.
• Create multiple profiles so each person gets a personalized entertainment experience.
• Go behind the scenes of movies and TV shows with exclusive X-Ray access, powered by IMDb (availability varies by marketplace).

Enjoy Prime Video updates on your Apple TV or Mac by downloading the latest app from the App Store on your device. This requires an Apple TV 3rd generation or later, and for Mac, macOS Big Sur 11.4 or later.

If you subscribe to Prime Video via iTunes (where available), payment is charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and your membership automatically renews monthly unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the then current plan period. Your account is charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of each plan period at the rate of your selected plan. Manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal anytime by going to My Account or through iTunes.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom or Brazil: By using this app, you agree to the Amazon Conditions of Use and the Prime Video Terms of Use at primevideo.com/ww-av-legal-home. See our Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice at primevideo.com/ww-av-legal-home.

For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the Amazon Conditions of Use, Privacy Notice, and and the Prime Video Terms of Use at primevideo.com/ww-av-legal-home.

Discover videos from around the world and create your own with easy-to-use tools to capture your life. 

From your morning coffee to your evening commute, TikTok has the videos to make your day. Whether you’re a sports fanatic, a travel lover or simply looking for a laugh, there’s something for everyone on TikTok. Enjoy an endless stream of short videos on things you love most. Watch what you like, skip what you don’t. 
 
WATCH
A personalised video feed based on what you watch, like, and share. TikTok offers you real, interesting, and fun videos that will make your day.  You'll find a variety of videos from Food and Fashion to Sports and DIY - and everything in between.

 
CREATE
Pause and resume your video with just a tap. As many times as you need.
Millions of creators on TikTok showcase their incredible skills and every day life. Let yourself be inspired.
 
ENTERTAIN
Be entertained and inspired by a global community of creators.

Take video creation to the next level with special effects, filters, music, and more. Unlock filters, effects, and AR objects to take your videos to the next level.
 
CUSTOMISE
Our integrated editing tools allow you to easily edit your videos.
Trim, cut, merge and duplicate video clips without leaving the app.
 
ADD MUSIC
Add your favorite sound to your videos with millions of music clips and sounds. 
We curate music and sound playlists for you with the hottest tracks in every genre, including Hip Hop, EM, Pop, Rock, Rap, and Country, and the most viral original sounds.

Obtain access to LIVE benefits to better interact with hosts!
Choose between a one-month subscription or auto-renewal subscription to enjoy special LIVE benefits (currently only available in limited regions)

Note: 
If you subscribe via Apple, payment will be charged to App Store Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of the selected plan. Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase.

Terms of Service —
https://www.tiktok.com/legal/terms-of-service

Privacy Policy —
https://www.tiktok.com/legal/privacy-policy

Dive into ShortMax, the prime video app for short dramas, movies, and reels! Perfect for quick breaks, commutes, or late-night binge sessions, our app delivers engaging stories in minutes.
Step into the realm of ShortMax, where an array of engaging short dramas and movies awaits your exploration. Immerse yourself in a diverse range of episodes and elevate your drama experience to new heights.
Indulge in a Tapestry of Genres
With ShortMax, you'll relish an assortment of genres spanning drama, romance, suspense, and thrilling mysteries. Embark on time-travel adventures, unravel enigmatic cases, or get swept away in the fantasy of romance with a pretend billionaire. Our collection of stories is as vast as your imagination!
Lose Yourself in Miniature Dramas
In just minutes, you'll be completely absorbed in these enthralling short narratives, igniting your passion for drama like never before.
Unveiling Exclusive Selection
ShortMax proudly presents a meticulously curated assortment of short plays. Each episode is carefully crafted, brimming with creativity, emotion, and depth, designed to transport you effortlessly into a multitude of imaginative realms.
Here's What Awaits You on ShortMax:
- An Array of Genres
From inspirational comebacks to enigmatic time-travel adventures, from the allure of ancient tales to modern love stories, ShortMax caters to every drama preference you desire.
- Tailored Recommendations
Our smart recommendation system ensures you easily find shows tailored to your tastes.
- Effortless Viewing Experience
With each short drama lasting just minutes, you can seamlessly enjoy them during your commute, breaks, or moments of leisure.
- Exclusive Original Content
Engage with bite-sized, drama-packed original shows that will keep you coming back for more. The entertainment never stops!
- Always Fresh
Stay up-to-date with real-time updates, ensuring a steady stream of the hottest short dramas and movies. Discover new favorites every week!
- Offline Download
Enjoy your downloaded content anytime, anywhere, even when you're offline.
- Your One-Stop Platform
ShortMax simplifies your viewing journey by providing a unified platform, eliminating the inconvenience of switching between sources.
- Visual Brilliance
Delight in high-definition visuals that capture every detail, creating an immersive feast for your eyes.
Embrace ShortMax as your gateway to the world of short dramas and movies, where limitless possibilities await. Download now and embark on an exhilarating journey through a universe of captivating short dramas, immersing yourself in the drama-watching experience!

Looking for the most talked about TV programmes and films from the around the world? They’re all on Netflix.

We’ve got award-winning series, films, documentaries and stand-up specials. And with the mobile app, you get Netflix while you travel, commute or just take a break.

What you’ll love about Netflix:
• We add TV programmes and films all the time. Browse new titles or search for your favourites, and stream videos straight to your device.
• The more you watch, the better Netflix gets at recommending TV programmes and films you’ll love.
• Enjoy a safe watching experience just for children with family-friendly entertainment.
• Preview quick videos of our series and films and get notifications for new episodes and releases.

Netflix membership is a month-to-month subscription that begins at sign-up. You can easily cancel at any time, online, 24 hours a day. There are no long-term contracts or cancellation fees. We just want you to love what you watch.

Please note that the App Privacy information applies to information collected through the Netflix iOS, iPadOS and tvOS apps. See the Netflix Privacy Statement (link below) to learn more about information we collect in other contexts, including account registration.

developer: BUBILET ORGANIZASYON REKLAM KULTUR VE TURIZM SANAYI TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
Etkinlik biletlerinizi, Bubilet mobil uygulamasıyla kolayca alın, unutulmaz anılar biriktirin!

Bubilet, konserlerden tiyatrolara, festivallerden çocuk ve spor etkinliklerine kadar geniş bir yelpaze sunan, pratik ve güvenilir bir mobil uygulamadır. Birkaç adımda biletinizi alın ve keyifli etkinliklere katılmanın tadını çıkarın! 

Bubilet Size Neler Sunar?

- Kolaylık ve Hız: En popüler konser, tiyatro, festival ve diğer etkinliklere bir tıkla ulaşın.

- Gelişmiş Arama: Türe, tarihe, lokasyona veya fiyata göre arama yaparak, istediğiniz etkinliği bulun.

- Güvenli Ödeme: 256 bit SSL ve 3D güvenli ödeme sistemi ile kredi veya banka kartınızla rahatça alışveriş yapın.

- Mobil Bilet: Fiziksel bilet taşımanıza gerek kalmadan, biletinizi uygulama üzerinden göstererek etkinliğinize katılın.

Bubilet, kültürel etkinliklere ulaşımınızı kolaylaştırır. Güvenli ödeme altyapısı, kullanıcı dostu arayüzü ve geniş etkinlik yelpazesi ile her zaman yanınızda. Artık konser, tiyatro ve festival biletlerini almak için uzun kuyruklarda beklemenize gerek yok!

Hemen Passo’yu indir, tek tıkla üye ol ve aradığın konser biletini al, maç heyecanını yaşa, alışveriş yap, yemek siparişi ver, sanal kart kullan, çekilişlere katıl!
Maç biletlerinden tiyatroya, konserlerden festivallere; elektronik ve spor ürün alışverişlerinden yemek siparişine, sanal karttan Passolig başvurusuna kadar ihtiyacın olan her şey yenilenen Passo mobil uygulamasında seni bekliyor. Passo; sanat tutkunları, futbolseverler, alışveriş meraklıları, teknoloji takipçileri ve avantaj arayan kullanıcılar için hepsi bir arada dijital yaşam asistanı oldu!
Uygulama üzerinden Passolig kart başvurusu yapabilir, derbi biletlerine anında ulaşabilirsin. Tiyatro ve stand-up gösterileri için yerini ayırtabilirMüze giriş bileti gibi kültürel etkinliklere birkaç dokunuşla ulaşabilirsin. Passo, e-bilet süresi uzatma, takım değiştirme, QR kodla stadyum ve konser alanlarına giriş gibi özelliklerle etkinlik deneyimini kolaylaştırır.
Etkinlik dışında da Passo ile alışveriş artık mobilde. Passo Dükkan’da lisanslı ürünlerin yanı sıra teknolojik cihazlardan giyime kadar birçok ürünü uygun fiyatlarla satın alabilirsin. Passo Kart ile güvenli ödeme yapabilir, N Kolay kredi ve nakit avans kampanyalarıyla indirimlerden yararlanabilirsin.
Yemek kategorisinde  maç menüleri , Ekonomix Menü, Arby’s menü, Burger menüsü gibi ürünlerle etkinlik öncesi hızlı ve uygun fiyatlı yemek siparişi verebilirsin. 
Finansal işlemlerinde de Passo yanında!Sanal kart oluşturabilir, dijital banka kartı ile mobil alışveriş yapabilir, alışveriş kredisi ile ihtiyacına uygun ürünleri satın alabilir, tüm harcamalarını kontrol altında tutabilirsin.
Passo Şans kategorisinde çekilişlerle dilediğin araca sahip olma şansı yakalayabilirsin. . Biletlerini dijital olarak saklayabilir, arkadaşına gönderebilir, iptal ya da satış işlemlerini kolayca gerçekleştirebilirsin.
Kişiselleştirilmiş bildirimlerle ilgilendiğin maçları, konserleri, tiyatroları ya da kampanyaları kaçırmazsın. Hemen Passo’yu indir, üye ol, Passo kampanyalarını takip et ve dijital deneyimin keyfini çıkar. Passo her zaman seninle!

Konser, Tiyatro ve Etkinlik Biletleri


●	Stadyum konserleri, Tüm Türkiye’deki festivaller
●	Sevilen tüm sanatçıların konser biletleri
●	Bodrum, İzmir, Antalya ve daha birçok yazlık şehirde yer alan antik tiyatrolardaki etkinlikler
Müze giriş biletleri ve daha fazlası..


Maç Bileti & Passolig İşlemleri


●	4 büyüklerin maç biletleri
●	Passolig kart başvuru, yenileme, e-bilet süresi uzatma işlemleri
●	QR kod ile hızlı ve temassız stadyum ve etkinlik girişi
●	Takım değiştirme, bilet iptali ve iade kolaylığı

 

 Passo Dükkan & Online Alışveriş


●	Teknoloji ürünleri, taraftar ürünleri, lisanslı ürünler, spor
Cep telefonu, akıllı saat, playstation, küçük ev aletleri, tablet, bilgisayar, kamera
●	Passo kampanya ve indirim fırsatları



Online Yemek Siparişi


●	Gastro Club
●	Menü kuponları
●	Etkinlik öncesi mobil yemek siparişi imkânı



Finansal Hizmetler


●	Sanal kart oluşturma ve kullanımı
●	Dijital banka kartı, uygulama içi bakiye yönetimi
●	N Kolay kampanyalarıyla ödeme kolaylığı
●	Alışveriş kredisi



Passo Şans & Çekilişler


●	Passo çekilişleriyle teknolojik üründen araçlara kadar çeşitli ürün kazanma şansı
●	Mobil bahis ve takımına özel şans avantajları

developer: BLUTV ILETISIM VE DIJITAL YAYIN HIZMETLERI ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
The most talked about shows and movies featuring the worlds of HBO, the DC Universe, Discovery, and beyond.  
 
With HBO Max you'll get: 
• Access to thousands of TV shows and movies.  
• Exclusive, award-winning series that everyone's talking about — like the HBO Originals The Last of Us, Succession, The White Lotus, and House of the Dragon. 
• Stream select live sports from some of your favorite events, leagues and teams. Availability varies by country or region, plan, and by subscription provider. 
• The latest hits from HBO, Max Originals, Discovery, Cartoon Network, ID, DC, Adult Swim, and more. 
• Iconic favorite TV shows like Friends, Rick and Morty, 90 Day Fiancé, Looney Tunes, and more. 
• Family-friendly entertainment for the whole household.  
• Fascinating documentaries and unscripted series.  
 
Features: 
• Enjoy your favorite shows and movies at home or on the go. HBO Max is available on select TV, web browser, mobile, tablet, and gaming console devices. (Device availability may vary by country or region and by plan.) 
• Browse or search with ease across HBO, movies, series, genres, and brands.  
• Download shows and movies you love to watch offline with select plans. (Download limits vary by plan.)  
• Create personalized profiles for the entire household complete with customizable ratings, and profile PIN protection options.  
• Pick up episodes and movies where you left off on any of your favorite devices.  
• Find everything you love, all in one place, with My Stuff.  
• Watch on multiple devices at the same time. (Limits vary by plan.)  
• Stream high-quality video up to 4K resolution and surround sound including Dolby Atmos (where available) on select plans.
 
Content, sports and feature availability on HBO Max may vary by country or region. Sports, where available, may in some countries require a separate add-on which must be added to a base plan. Some titles and features shown above may not be available in your country or region. Language availability varies by country and region.  
 
You will be charged for your subscription on a recurring basis unless you cancel at least 24 hours before your next billing date. Your App Store account will automatically be charged within 24 hours prior to the end of the current billing period. When you cancel, you will have access until the end of your current billing period. You can manage or cancel your subscription by visiting the App Store app or Subscriptions under Settings on your Apple device after purchase. 

Purposes disclosed in the App Privacy label may vary based on features or services that may not be available in all countries or regions. HBO Max is only available in certain countries or regions.  
 
Terms of Use: https://hbomax.com/terms-of-use/

developer: BILETIX BILET DAGITIM BASIM VE TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
Biletix – Your Event Tickets, Always with You!
With the Biletix app, you can easily find tickets for thousands of events including theatre, stand-up shows, festivals, sports games, and workshops. Enjoy the fastest, easiest, and 100% secure ticket-buying experience—get your tickets in seconds.
Key Features: 
• View your previously purchased tickets in the My Tickets section.
• Add your favorite artists to your list and get notified about their upcoming events.
• Save events you’re interested in under Preferences and buy them whenever you like.
• Enable location access to discover events happening near you.
Getting your event tickets has never been this easy.
Secure your spot instantly with Biletix!

Welcome to NetShort, a next-generation HD streaming platform where we offer exclusive vertical TV programming. Our goal is to change how you watch movies, allowing you to enjoy mini-series up to one minute long anytime, anywhere. Whether you're at home or on the go, NetShort lets you watch the most popular mini-series, providing an immersive viewing experience. Join us today!

Here's what awaits you:

"Exclusive Personal Theater"
Easily explore popular genres like romance, fantasy, martial arts, and time travel. All exciting mini-series are authorized. New episodes are added daily and weekly, keeping you immersed in imaginative worlds.

"Customize Your Experience"
Let NetShort's customizable features bring you a personalized viewing experience. Adjust video playback settings as you like, explore various genres, and plan your watchlist. In this vast realm of outstanding short videos, create a personalized journey tailored to your preferences. Your entertainment, your customization!

"Exclusive Originals"
Explore a world of content you won't find elsewhere. At NetShort, we're excited to present a series of exclusive original short videos. We promise fresh perspectives, unique narratives, and unparalleled creativity. Immerse yourself in diverse and captivating stories, each showcasing the art of concise and powerful storytelling.

"Frequent Updates"
Experience the joy of discovering new content through NetShort's regular updates! Our library continues to expand, ensuring each visit to the app brings fresh and engaging episodes. Say goodbye to mundane routines and embrace an endless stream of entertainment trends!

What are you waiting for? NetShort: Popular Short Dramas & TV is free to use, offering exclusive benefits for those seeking a more immersive experience.

Download now and dive deep into the world of entertainment!

Tired of never finishing a movie or paying for unused subscriptions? 

Watch ReelShort — Every Second is Drama

Say hello to ReelShort, a next-gen HD streaming short movie platform offering exclusive vertical TV mini series. Recognized by Times100 for our movie reels innovation in the entertainment industry, we're changing the way you watch movies with our one-minute short movie episodes that you can enjoy anytime, anywhere, all from the convenience of your phone with the ReelShort App.

Choose from our TV mini series library packed with endless addictive movie shorts added daily, from romantic encounters with billionaires and heart-wrenching tragedies to epic comeback stories and more—you won't ever be short on short movie entertainment!

Featured Shows:
[Don't Miss Me When I'm Gone] After losing my parents, I move in with my godmother, Aunt Sandra. I live under her roof with her two sons-the Miller brothers-surrounded by love and care. I think I’ll end up with one of them. But everything changes when the maid’s daughter, Lola, moves in. The Miller brother I love most breaks my heart into pieces. After I leave, they lose their minds trying to find me.

[Move Aside! I'm the Final Boss] Kingsley is the secret King of King's Corps and the richest man on Earth, but when he returns from the battlefield, his childhood sweetheart brutally dumps him, thinking he's a clown. How will the King of all men make her regret it?

Here's why you'll love ReelShort:

Bite-sized original movie shorts designed for on-the-go viewing
•Exclusive short movies with juicy vertical content that will keep you hooked
•New TV mini series added daily, with hundreds of new episodes each month
•Hollywood-quality entertainment, crafted for the big screen delivered to your small screen
•The first ever interactive live action short movies, where you decide what happens next
Experience the future of short movie entertainment, one minute at a time — download ReelShort now!

"Crazy Maple Studio is quietly changing the streaming game with its ReelShort app." - Time100 

"The biggest player in this new genre is ReelShort." - New York Times

"Every minute has a hook that keeps you watching." - Wall Street Journal

"ReelShort, which has dozens of shows — similarly light on character development and packed with curveballs — made for binge-watching in minutes." - Washington Post

developer: SISAL SANS INTERAKTIF HIZMETLER VE SANS OYUNLARI YATIRIMLARI ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
Milli Piyango Mobil Uygulaması ile büyük ikramiyeler, eğlenceli oyunlar ve haftanın 7 günü süren çekiliş heyecanı her an her yerde!

Çılgın Sayısal Loto, Süper Loto, Şans Topu, On Numara, Kazı Kazan Online, Sanal Oyunlar ve şimdi yepyeni Hızlı On ile dilediğin zaman, dilediğin yerden şansını dene. Hızlı ve güvenli oyun deneyimiyle kazanma heyecanını anında yaşa!

Şans Oyunları Tarihinde Bir İlk: Hızlı On, Milli Piyango Online’da!

5 dakikada bir gerçekleşen çekilişleriyle Hızlı On, sürekli yenilenen bir heyecan sunuyor. Dilediğin kadar sayı seçerek oyna, onlarca farklı ikramiye kazanma şansı yakala! Üstelik Hızlı On’un büyük ikramiyesi tam 25 Milyon TL. Haftanın 7 günü oynanabilen bu yeni oyunla sen de çekiliş heyecanını yaşa, anında kazanma şansını kaçırma.

Sanal Oyunlar ile Kesintisiz ve Hızlı Eğlence!

Yenilenen tasarımı ve dinamik arayüzüyle Sanal Oyunlar şimdi daha heyecanlı! Her 5 dakikada 1 gerçek maç görüntüleriyle desteklenen Serbest Vuruş Pro, Pro Lig ve daha birçok popüler ve hızlı tempolu oyunlarla heyecanı yaşa!

Kazı Kazan Online İle Anında Kazan!

150’den fazla Kazı Kazan oyunu ile dilediğin an, dilediğin yerde kazanma heyecanını yaşa! Anında eğlence her an seninle!

Çılgın Sayısal Loto'nun Çılgın İkramiyeleri!

Haftanın 3 günü gerçekleşen çekilişleriyle çılgın hayallerin çılgın ikramiyesi, Çılgın Sayısal Loto’da seninle! Üstelik SüperStar özelliği ile oyna, tek numarayla bile kazanma şansını artır!

Süper Loto: Her Hafta Süper Kazanç!

Süper büyük ikramiyelerin adresi Süper Loto’da! Her hafta gerçekleşen üç çekilişiyle sıradaki talihli sen olabilirsin. Şimdi şansını dene!

Şans Topu: Şanslı Numaralarla Talihli Olma Şansı!

Her hafta gerçekleşen çekilişlerle milyonlara şans dağıtan Şans Topu, kazandırmaya devam ediyor. Sen de katıl, sıradaki talihli olarak büyük ikramiyeleri kazanma şansını yakala!

On Numara İkramiyeler: On Numara’da!

Haftada 2 çekilişle On Numara’da şansını artır! Doğru 10 numarayı bil, o haftanın büyük ikramiyesini kazan!

Haftanın Her Günü Çekiliş!

Milli Piyango’da haftanın her günü bir çekiliş var! Sayısal Oyunlar’ın çekilişleri Milli Piyango TV üzerinden canlı yayınlanıyor. Çekiliş heyecanını mobil uygulama üzerinden anbean yaşa!

Tek Tıkla Para Yatır ve Çek!

Kullanıcı dostu ara yüzüyle hızlı ve güvenli para yatırma/çekme işlemleri yapabilirsin. Anlaşmalı bankaların internet, mobil, ATM ya da telefon bankacılığı kanallarını kullanarak hesabına kolayca para yatırabilirsin.

Kontrolörle Bilet Kazancını Anında Öğren!

Mobil uygulamadaki kontrolör ile bilet numaranı ya da biletindeki karekodu kullanarak, kazandığın ikramiyeyi saniyeler içinde öğren!

Tadında Oyna, Tadını Çıkar! 

Herkesin şansı olarak milyonlarca kişiye eğlence ve heyecan sunan Milli Piyango, oyuncularına keyifli ve bilinçli bir oyun deneyimi sunma hedefiyle hareket etmektedir. Para yatırma limiti, kendini devre dışı bırakma ve diğer sorumlu oyun uygulamalarımızla kontrol hep sende. Şans oyunlarının bir gelir kaynağı olmadığını unutma. Daha fazla bilgi için sorumlu oyun sayfamızı ziyaret edebilirsin: https://www.millipiyangoonline.com/Sorumlu_oyun.
Destek ihtiyacı duyarsan, 115 numaralı YEDAM Danışma Hattı’nı ücretsiz arayarak uzmanlardan destek alabilirsin. https://www.yesilay.org.tr/

Fikirlerini Bizlerle Paylaş!

App Store’da yazdığın yorumlar, daha iyi hizmet verebilmemiz için önemlidir. Milli Piyango Şans Oyunları Uygulamasını puanlayabilir ve yorumlarını paylaşabilirsin.

Bizlere 0850 390 73 33 numaralı müşteri hizmetlerinden veya destek@millipiyangoonline.com adresinden ulaşabilirsin.

【Diverse Themes】
From the protagonist's road to revenge, to heartwarming love stories, from modern romance and urban romance, to clumsy ladies, miracle doctors, presidents, billionaires, queens, and gods of war, you can find your favorite genres and themes here!

Perfect for on-thego viewing, our short episodes fitseamlessly into your busy schedule, soyou can catch up on your favorite storiesanytime, anywhere.

Create a personalized playlist, a small tree hole for watching dramas.

Download Micro Drama now and start your drama journey!

developer: LIFECELL TV YAYIN VE ICERIK HIZMETLERI ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
If you want to watch domestic and international movies and series in genres like horror, comedy, animation, drama, and action, along with documentaries, cartoons, and live TV, TV+ is the place to be! TV+ brings together hundreds of contents under one roof—from local and foreign films to series, documentaries, animations, and sports broadcasts.


Open to all operators, on TV+ you can watch award-winning movies and series anytime, record and rewind programs you missed, and dive into the exciting world of documentaries. All you need to do is download the app and subscribe!


Experience the Joy of Movies on TV+


TV+ brings the red carpet spirit to your home! Box office record-breaking action movies, award-winning adventure films, romantic comedies, fun animations, and thrilling horror movies are waiting for you on TV+. Enjoy the pleasure of watching films in full 4K Ultra HD quality and bring the cinema experience right to your living room.


From the best local films like Masumiyet, Bergen, Aykut Enişte 2, Eşkiya, and Kuru Otlar Üstüne to popular international favorites such as The Zone of Interest, The Beekeeper, Se7en, Parasite, and John Wick 4, TV+ offers an extensive library. With its gala concept, TV+ also brings you exclusive titles like Maria, Conclave The Order, and My Favourite Cake, which you won’t find anywhere else!


Enjoy Local and International Series


Get hooked on dozens of local and international series exclusively on TV+! From gripping foreign productions like Tulsa King, The Walking Dead, From, The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel, and Fargo to highly anticipated new seasons of local series such as Gassal, Çırak, and Hür, TV+ has it all waiting for you. Download the TV+ app now and start exploring to fully enjoy your series experience.


Favorite Kids’ Movies and Cartoons on TV+ Kids


Is it Pepee, Kral Şakir, or Garfield? Your child’s favorite cartoons and movies come to life on TV+! A rich archive of entertaining cartoons, educational animations, and beloved classics awaits your little ones on TV+. Alongside popular series like Pepee, Kral Şakir, Kukuli, Cedric, and SpongeBob, TV+ also offers animated hits like Garfield, Minions, The Boss Baby, and Sonic the Hedgehog. Plus, beloved Lego Marvel characters like Batman, Superman, and Iron Man are also part of TV+!


Live TV Channels and Sports Matches


Easily zap through live TV channels on TV+, and watch missed or replayed programs anytime by recording and rewinding. Watch national channels, music channels, documentary channels, and many more live on TV+. Sports fans never run out of excitement with TV+! Follow EuroLeague, NBA, UFC, La Liga, and Serie A live and uninterrupted on S Sport 1 and 2, all exclusively on TV+. Meanwhile, on tabii spor, enjoy selected UEFA Champions League matches along with the excitement of the FA Cup.


Premium TV+ Channels


TV+ offers favorite kids’ channels like Disney Jr, Moonbug Kids, Nick Jr, Cartoon Network, and Baby TV, alongside documentary essentials such as National Geographic HD, Discovery Channel, and History TV. Additionally, you can watch popular movie and series channels like Sinema TV, FX, Epic Drama HD, Sinema Aile, and tabii TV anytime you want!


In-App Purchases:


When purchasing a monthly or yearly subscription through the app, payment will be charged to your iTunes account at the price corresponding to your country. Pricing details will be shown before completing the payment. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the period. Your iTunes account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period, according to your selected plan (monthly or yearly). You can turn off auto-renewal anytime in your iTunes account settings. Canceling a subscription during an active period is not possible; subscriptions remain active until the end of the paid period.

Term of Use
https://tvplus.com.tr/terms-of-use

Kaave, the fortune teller that is always with you!

Gloria and her friends, who bring over 50 million users from the four corners of the world together with their fortunes and readings, are the new faces of a mystical tradition spanning the ages. Kaave is the first and only app which offers real fortune tellers and readers and an advanced artificial intelligence that has been taught human intuition.

Kaave reveals the mysteries in Tarot cards, interprets symbols in coffee fortunes, ensures you guide your day with angel cards and brightens up your future with astrology.

Our expert fortune tellers: Gloria and her friends! Who are they? Our family is made up of our sweet big sister Gloria; Esmeralda, who draws her strength from her intuition; our eldest, Aunt Sophie; the flamboyant Jasmine; our sweet angel Elix; our classy aunt Judith; Baroness, who enlightens with her knowledge; Isabel who comes to the fore with her mystical energy; the mysterious Zaliha and our wild child, the sometimes harsh Lorenzo.

What do you say to meeting Kaave's experienced fortune tellers and being informed of developments that will directly affect your future? Well, here are some features that Kaave has developed for you to be able to crack open the doors of a mystical world:

•	TAROT
The Sun, The World or The Moon... Kaave meticulously analyzes the secrets appearing before you in every tarot card. Kaave, the modern face of the tarot tradition that spans centuries, reads tarot cards for you and provides important information about love, work or money.

•	ANGEL CARDS
Make a wish, choose your Angel Card unique to Kaave and discover predictions that you will not find anywhere else before you begin a new day, a new job or any venture that is important to you.

•	ASTROLOGY
The positions of the stars and planets herald the events that you may potentially encounter. If you want to learn and understand the effect the Sun, Moon or Mercury has on your life, or how compatible "that person" on your mind is, you will find the answer in astrology readings unique to you.

•	CLAIRVOYANCE
She knows the question on your mind without you even asking it. This is because the answer has been on her mind since long ago. She shares in your problems as well as your happiness with the answers she provides.

•	LOVES ME, LOVES ME NOT
Does he or she love me, or not? Will it happen, or not? Easily plan your future actions according to the final petal!

•	COFFEE FORTUNE READING
The coffee grounds remaining in the Turkish coffee cup gives information about the surprises in your relationship, at work or your future. Send photographs of the coffee grounds that have cooled in your cup as well as on its saucer and learn your future!

•	SYMPATHETIC EAR
Are there many things to talk about but there isn't a shoulder to cry on whose every word you can trust? Tell all your problems to Sympathetic Ear and let her find a way out for you and help you pour your heart out.

Kaave's Stand-Out Features

•	Learn all the details of your fortune with live fortune tellers and ask the questions you wish to ask!
•	Have a fun time and win prizes exclusive to you with Gloria's Garden game while Kaave fortune tellers read your fortune.
•	Don't forget to use Shake and Win which gives out thousands of prizes every day!
•	Your fortunes and readings will be read for free before everyone else's if you become a subscriber.

The fortune tellers you will encounter on Kaave each have their own unique mystical qualities as well as having different colorful-minded characteristics. Millions of Kaave users specifically choose the fortune tellers to whom they feel most closely aligned to for the fortunes and readings they enjoy every day.

So come on, now it's your turn to download Kaave and learn about your future like so many millions of other people have done already!

***

Privacy policy: https://www.kaaveapp.com/en/privacy
Terms of use: https://www.kaaveapp.com/en/usage

With the free Steam Mobile App, you can take Steam with you anywhere. Buy PC games and get the latest game and community news - while protecting your Steam account.

Shop Steam
Browse the Steam catalog of PC games from your phone. Never miss a sale again.

Steam Guard
Protect your Steam account and make sign in faster with two-factor authentication.
• Two-factor authentication to ensure you’re the only one with access to your account
• QR code sign in - Scan a QR code to sign into Steam instead of entering a password or…
• Sign in confirmation - Confirm your regular Steam sign ins with simple “approve” or “deny”

Library & Remote downloads
The new Library view makes it easy to view game content, discussions, guides, support, and more. Plus you can manage game downloads and updates to your PC from your phone.

Trade and Market Confirmations
Speed up item trades and sales by using your phone to confirm them.

Plus
• A personalized News feed based on your Library with the latest news, events, and content updates direct from publishers and game developers.
• Customizable Steam notifications: wishlist, sales, comments, trades, discussions, friend requests, and more.
• Access to the entire Steam Community - discussions, groups, guides, Market, Workshop, broadcasts, and more.
• Access to your friends, friend activity, groups, screenshots, inventory, wallet, and more.
• Authorized Devices - Manage access to the devices your account has signed in
• An improved Store browsing experience for mobile screens
• Support for using multiple Steam accounts in the app
• Support for customizing your app's main tabs

Connect. Discover. Control.

Stay connected to your gaming friends and the games you love to play, wherever you go with PlayStation App. See who's online, voice chat and send messages, and discover deals on PS Store.

Connect with friends
• See who's online and which games they're playing.
• Voice chat and send messages to your PSN friends, hang out online and plan your next multiplayer session.
• View other players' profiles and trophy collections.

Discover new games and the latest news
• Shop for new releases, pre-order games and check out the latest deals and discounts on PlayStation Store.
• Get your daily fix of gaming news from the world of PlayStation.
• Stay up to date with notifications and invitations on your phone lock screen.

Control your console wherever you are
• Download games and add-ons to your console so they're ready when you are.
• Manage your PS5 console storage if you run out of space while downloading.
• Get ready to play with quick sign-in and remote game launch on your PS5 console.

Account for PlayStation Network required to use this app.

PlayStation terms of service are viewable at https://www.playstation.com/legal/psn-terms-of-service/.

Some features require PS5 or PS4 console.

Content available on PS App may vary by country/region. Some titles shown above may not be available in your country/region.

“PlayStation”, “PlayStation Family Mark”, “PS5” and “PS4” are registered trademarks or trademarks of Sony Interactive Entertainment Inc.

developer: Mars Sinema Turizm Ve Sportif Tesisler Isletmeciligi A.S.
description:
Cineverse uygulamasıyla filmler hakkında yorum yapabilir, fragmanları izleyebilir, seans ve salon seçerek hızlıca bilet alabilirsin! 

Uygulama üzerinden biletini göster, sıra beklemeden sinema keyfini yaşa! 

Üstelik CGV Cinema Club üyeleri uygulama üzerinden de kazanmaya devam ediyor! 
Henüz üye değilsen kolaylıkla CGV Cinema Club üyesi olup sana özel fırsat ve indirimleri yakalamaya başlayabilirsin!

Inspire your children to uncover their unique interests
Help your children explore video content that they love and that parents trust, in an app made just for children. With easy navigation tools and a suite of features, you can help your children spend time online uncovering new interests, unleashing their imagination and building their confidence in their own unique world.

Help your children grow at their own pace
Your children are unique, so they should only see content that they're ready to explore. Decide what videos will help them make the most of their time online, then personalise individual profiles using custom content filters as they grow.

– Help your youngest children learn their ABCs, nurture their curiosity and more in 'Preschool' mode.
– Expand your children's interests to songs, cartoons or DIY crafts in 'Younger' mode.
– Give your older children the freedom to search popular music and gaming videos in 'Older' mode.
– Or, hand-pick the videos, channels and collections that your children can see in 'Approved content only' mode.

Rewatch videos and bond over favourites
Quickly find your children's favourite videos and the content that you've shared with them in the 'Watch it again' tab.

Shape your children's viewing experience with parental controls
Parental control features help you limit what your children watch, and better guide their viewing experience. Our blocking process aims to help keep videos on YouTube Kids family-friendly and safe – but each family's preferences are unique. Don't like a video or channel, or see inappropriate content? Flag it for our team to review.

Set a screen-time limit
Encourage your children to take a break in between exploring content. Use the 'Timer' feature to freeze the app when screen time is up so that your children can apply their new skills to the real world.

See important information
– Parental setup is needed to ensure the best experience for your family.
– Children may see commercial content from YouTube creators that are not paid ads.
– See the Privacy Notice for Google Accounts managed with Family Link for information on our privacy practices for signing in with a Google Account.
– If your children use the app without signing in with their Google Account, the YouTube Kids Privacy Notice applies.

GAİN NEDİR?
GAİN, televizyon ve sinema dünyasının eğitici, eğlenceli ve popüler içeriklerini bir arada sunan yeni nesil dizi ve film platformudur. Farklı seslere, başka renklere ve çeşitli bakış açılarına sahip içerikleri kullanıcılarıyla buluşturan GAİN ile yerli ve yabancı dizi-filmleri, belgeselleri, haber, müzik, spor ve eğlence programlarını, bir de tüm bunların yanı sıra canlı yayınları HD ve 4K formatında izleyebilirsin.
AI tabanlı algoritması ve güncel içerik alternatifleri ile herkesin kendine göre içerik bulabileceği kesintisiz film izleme sitesi ve uygulaması olan GAİN üzerinden dilersen birden fazla liste oluşturabilir, kendine uygun modu seçebilir, yakında gelecek olan içerikleri takip edebilir, beğendiğin dizi ve filmleri istediğin zaman, istediğin yerden izleyebilirsin.
KAÇIRILMAYACAK DİZİLER VE FİLMLER
GAİN; HD film kalitesiyle yabancı dizi, korku filmleri, aksiyon filmleri, komedi filmleri, romantik filmler ve talkshow gibi geniş bir içerik yelpazesine sahiptir.
Türkiye’nin en popüler komedi dizilerinden Ayak İşleri serisinin yanı sıra; Mahsun J, Ru, Şahsiyet, Arjen, Hamlet, 10 Bin Adım, Orta Kafa Aşk, BKM Mutfak ve Tuz Biber gibi birçok popüler içeriğe de ev sahipliği yapar.
Sinema filmlerine ilgi duyanlar ise; John Wick serisi, Taxi, Green Book, Arrival, Her Şey Çok Güzel Olacak, Aile Arasında ve Kelebekler gibi sevilen filmleri bu platformda bulabilir.
Ödüllü filmleri yakından takip eden sinemaseverler de; Eşkıya, Gergedan Mevsimi, Her, Slumdog Millionaire gibi Türkçe ve İngilizce dublajlı filmleri GAİN ayrıcalığıyla izleyebilir.
Hadise ve Seda Bakan’ın başrollerini paylaşacağı “Esas Oğlan” dizisi başta olmak üzere yakında yayınlanacak birçok içeriği de yine GAİN’de üyelik oluşturarak takip edebilirsin.
EN İYİ FİLMLERİ ve DİZİLERİ DİLEDİĞİN CİHAZDA HD ve 4K İZLE
GAİN, kaliteli zaman geçirmek isteyen herkes için farklı cihazlarda aynı anda kullanım imkanı sunar. Böylece film ve dizileri; telefon, tablet, bilgisayar ve televizyon gibi her türlü cihazda HD ya da 4K seçeneği ile aynı anda izleyebilirsin.
SANA GÖRE İÇERİK
GAİN, farklı zevklere ve ilgi alanlarına sahip kullanıcılar için her zaman ilgi çekici içerikler sunar. Yayın akışını kişiselleştirme özelliği ile beğendiğin içeriklere daha rahat ulaşabilir, dizi ve filmleri ister Türkçe dublajlı ister alt yazılı izleyebilirsin.
FİLM İNDİRME SEÇENEĞİ İLE ÇEVRİM DIŞI İZLE
Mahsun J, Ru, Ayak İşleri gibi tv dizilerine ve sinema filmlerine ev sahipliği yapan GAİN mobil uygulaması ile dilediğin içeriği tercih ettiğin kalitede telefonuna indirebilir, hareket halindeyken ya da internet erişiminin sınırlı olduğu alanlarda çevrim dışı olarak izleyebilirsin.
GAİN, yenilenen tasarımı ile kullanıcılarına birçok kolay kullanım seçeneği sunar. Picture in picture özelliği ile dilediğin içeriği izlerken, aynı zamanda telefonundaki diğer işlerini de tamamlayabilirsin.
ÜYELİK
Birçok yerli ve yabancı içeriğe ev sahipliği yapan GAİN’de üyelik oluşturarak ücretsiz film izleme olanaklarından yararlanabilirsin. GAİN aboneliğini, istediğin zaman iptal edebilirsin. Fakat abonelik devam ettiği sürece otomatik olarak yenilenecektir.
Aşağıdaki bağlantıları kullanarak üyelik koşullarımızı ve gizlilik politikamızı okuyabilirsin.
 
Üyelik ve sözleşmesi: https://www.gain.tv/yasal/uyelik-sozlesmesi
Gizlilik politikası: https://www.gain.tv/yasal/gizlilik-politikasi
 
Soru, yorum ve uygulamamızı geliştirmeye yönelik önerilerin için destek@gain.com.tr adresi üzerinden iletişime geçebilirsin.

• Community sharing: Share your color by number creations and discover other users' pixel art in our thriving community of coloring enthusiasts.

Get ready to relax and express your creativity with this free coloring game that combines the joy of art with the benefits of stress relief. Download now and start your colorful journey today!
